ps2.2:1.5: ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti tathametam avitathametam anannathametam, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti tathametam avitathametam anannathametam, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti tathametam avitathametam anannathametam.
ps2.2:1.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari tathani avitathani anannathani”.
ps2.2:2.2: Cattaro dukkhassa dukkhattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:2.4: ime cattaro dukkhassa dukkhattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:3.2: Cattaro samudayassa samudayattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:3.4: ime cattaro samudayassa samudayattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:4.2: Cattaro nirodhassa nirodhattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:4.4: ime cattaro nirodhassa nirodhattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:5.2: Cattaro maggassa maggattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:5.4: ime cattaro maggassa maggattha tatha avitatha anannatha.
ps2.2:7.3: Dukkhassa dukkhattho tathattho, samudayassa samudayattho tathattho, nirodhassa nirodhattho tathattho, maggassa maggattho tathattho—
ps2.2:7.4: imehi catuhakarehi tathatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:8.3: Dukkhassa dukkhattho anattattho, samudayassa samudayattho anattattho, nirodhassa nirodhattho anattattho, maggassa maggattho anattattho—
ps2.2:8.4: imehi catuhakarehi anattatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:9.3: Dukkhassa dukkhattho saccattho, samudayassa samudayattho saccattho, nirodhassa nirodhattho saccattho, maggassa maggattho saccattho—
ps2.2:9.4: imehi catuhakarehi saccatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:10.3: Dukkhassa dukkhattho pativedhattho, samudayassa samudayattho pativedhattho nirodhassa nirodhattho pativedhattho, maggassa maggattho pativedhattho—
ps2.2:10.4: imehi catuhakarehi pativedhatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani yam ekasangahitam tam ekattam.
ps2.2:11.2: Yam aniccam tam dukkham, yam dukkham tam aniccam, yam aniccanca dukkhanca tam anatta.
ps2.2:11.3: Yam aniccanca dukkhanca anatta ca tam tatham.
ps2.2:11.4: Yam aniccam ca dukkhanca anatta ca tathanca tam saccam.
ps2.2:11.5: Yam aniccanca dukkhanca anatta ca tathanca saccanca tam ekasangahitam.
ps2.2:12.3: Tathatthena, anattatthena, saccatthena, pativedhatthena, abhinnatthena, parinnatthena, pahanatthena, bhavanatthena, sacchikiriyatthena—
ps2.2:13.3: Dukkhassa dukkhattho tathattho, samudayassa samudayattho tathattho, nirodhassa nirodhattho tathattho, maggassa maggattho tathattho, abhinnaya abhinnattho tathattho, parinnaya parinnattho tathattho, pahanassa pahanattho tathattho, bhavanaya bhavanattho tathattho, sacchikiriyaya sacchikiriyattho tathattho—
ps2.2:13.4: imehi navahakarehi tathatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:14.5: Dukkhassa dukkhattho pativedhattho, samudayassa samudayattho pativedhattho, nirodhassa nirodhattho pativedhattho, maggassa maggattho pativedhattho, abhinnaya abhinnattho pativedhattho, parinnaya parinnattho pativedhattho, pahanassa pahanattho pativedhattho, bhavanaya bhavanattho pativedhattho, sacchikiriyaya sacchikiriyattho pativedhattho—
ps2.2:14.6: imehi navahakarehi pativedhatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:15.3: Tathatthena, anattatthena, saccatthena, pativedhatthena, abhijananatthena, parijananatthena, dhammatthena, tathatthena, natatthena, sacchikiriyatthena, phassanatthena, abhisamayatthena—
ps2.2:15.4: imehi dvadasahi akarehi cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:16.3: Dukkhassa pilanattho, sankhatattho, santapattho, viparinamattho, tathattho;
ps2.2:16.4: samudayassa ayuhanattho, nidanattho, samyogattho, palibodhattho tathattho;
ps2.2:16.5: nirodhassa nissaranattho, vivekattho, asankhatattho, amatattho tathattho;
ps2.2:16.6: maggassa niyyanattho, hetuttho, dassanattho, adhipateyyattho tathattho—
ps2.2:16.7: imehi solasahi akarehi tathatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:17.12: Solasahi akarehi abhisamayatthena cattari saccani ekappativedhani.
ps2.2:17.13: Dukkhassa pilanattho, sankhatattho, santapattho, viparinamattho, abhisamayattho;
ps2.2:17.14: samudayassa ayuhanattho, nidanattho, samyogattho, palibodhattho, abhisamayattho;
ps2.2:17.15: nirodhassa nissaranattho, vivekattho, asankhatattho, amatattho, abhisamayattho;
ps2.2:17.16: maggassa niyyanattho, hetuttho, dassanattho, adhipateyyattho, abhisamayattho—
ps2.2:17.17: imehi solasahi akarehi abhisamayatthena cattari saccani ekasangahitani.
ps2.2:19.3: Sankhatanam saccanam uppado pannayati, vayo pannayati, thitanam annathattam pannayati asankhatassa saccassa na uppado pannayati, na vayo pannayati, na thitassa annathattam pannayati—
ps2.2:20.3: Dukkhasaccassa uppado pannayati, vayo pannayati, thitassa annathattam pannayati;
ps2.2:20.4: samudayasaccassa uppado pannayati, vayo pannayati, thitassa annathattam pannayati;
ps2.2:20.5: maggasaccassa uppado pannayati, vayo pannayati, thitassa annathattam pannayati;
ps2.2:20.6: nirodhasaccassa na uppado pannayati, na vayo pannayati, na thitassa annathattam pannayati—
ps2.2:21.1: Catunnam saccanam kati kusala, kati akusala, kati abyakata?
ps2.2:21.2: Samudayasaccam akusalam, maggasaccam kusalam, nirodhasaccam abyakatam.
ps2.2:21.3: Dukkhasaccam siya kusalam, siya akusalam, siya abyakatam.
ps2.2:22.1: Siya tini saccani ekasaccena sangahitani, ekasaccam tihi saccehi sangahitam?
ps2.2:22.5: evam akusalatthena dve saccani ekasaccena sangahitani, ekasaccam dvihi saccehi sangahitam.
ps2.2:22.7: evam kusalatthena dve saccani ekasaccena sangahitani, ekasaccam dvihi saccehi sangahitam.
ps2.2:22.9: evam abyakatatthena dve saccani ekasaccena sangahitani, ekasaccam dvihi saccehi sangahitam.
ps2.2:22.10: Evam siya tini saccani ekasaccena sangahitani, ekasaccam tihi saccehi sangahitam vatthuvasena pariyayenati.
ps2.2:23.1: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi—
ps2.2:23.2: ‘ko nu kho rupassa assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
ps2.2:23.3: ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
ps2.2:23.4: ko sannaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
ps2.2:23.5: ko sankharanam assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
ps2.2:23.6: ko vinnanassa assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
ps2.2:23.8: ‘yam kho rupam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
ps2.2:23.10: Yam rupam aniccam, tam dukkham viparinamadhammam—
ps2.2:23.17: yam vinnanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
ps2.2:23.19: Yam vinnanam aniccam tam dukkham viparinamadhammam—
ps2.2:24.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim, athaham, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
ps2.2:25.1: Yam rupam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam rupassa assadoti—
ps2.2:25.3: Yam rupam aniccam tam dukkham viparinamadhammam, ayam rupassa adinavoti—
ps2.2:25.5: Yo rupasmim chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam rupassa nissarananti—
ps2.2:25.7: Ya imesu tisu thanesu ditthi sankappo vaca kammanto ajivo vayamo sati samadhi—
ps2.2:26.4: yam vinnanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vinnanassa assadoti—
ps2.2:26.6: Yam vinnanam aniccam tam dukkham viparinamadhammam, ayam vinnanassa adinavoti—
ps2.2:26.8: Yo vinnanasmim chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vinnanassa nissarananti—
ps2.2:26.10: Ya imesu tisu thanesu ditthi sankappo vaca kammanto ajivo vayamo sati samadhi—
ps2.2:27.8: Jaramarananca pajanati, jaramaranasamudayanca pajanati, jaramarananirodhanca pajanati, jaramarananirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:28.5: Jatinca pajanati, jatisamudayanca pajanati, jatinirodhanca pajanati, jatinirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:29.5: Bhavam ca pajanati, bhavasamudayanca pajanati, bhavanirodhanca pajanati, bhavanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:30.5: Upadananca pajanati, upadanasamudayanca pajanati, upadananirodhanca pajanati upadananirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:31.5: Tanhanca pajanati, tanhasamudayanca pajanati, tanhanirodhanca pajanati, tanhanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:32.5: Vedananca pajanati, vedanasamudayanca pajanati, vedananirodhanca pajanati, vedananirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:33.5: Phassanca pajanati, phassasamudayanca pajanati, phassanirodhanca pajanati, phassanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:34.5: Salayatananca pajanati, salayatanasamudayanca pajanati, salayatananirodhanca pajanati, salayatananirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:35.5: Namarupanca pajanati, namarupasamudayanca pajanati, namarupanirodhanca pajanati, namarupanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:36.5: Vinnananca pajanati, vinnanasamudayanca pajanati, vinnananirodhanca pajanati, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:37.5: Sankhare ca pajanati, sankharasamudayanca pajanati, sankharanirodhanca pajanati, sankharanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
ps2.2:38.1: Jaramaranam dukkhasaccam, jati samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.2: Jati dukkhasaccam, bhavo samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.3: Bhavo dukkhasaccam, upadanam samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.4: Upadanam dukkhasaccam, tanha samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.5: Tanha dukkhasaccam, vedana samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.6: Vedana dukkhasaccam, phasso samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.7: Phasso dukkhasaccam, salayatanam samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.8: Salayatanam dukkhasaccam, namarupam samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.9: Namarupam dukkhasaccam, vinnanam samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.10: Vinnanam dukkhasaccam, sankhara samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:38.11: Sankhara dukkhasaccam, avijja samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:39.1: Jaramaranam siya dukkhasaccam, siya samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccam.
ps2.2:39.3: bhavo siya dukkhasaccam, siya samudayasaccam, ubhinnampi nissaranam nirodhasaccam, nirodhappajanana maggasaccanti.
